name: EC2ContainerServiceServiceLoadBalancers
description: LoadBalancers is a property of the AWS::ECS::Service resource that specifies the load balancer to associate with an Amazon EC2 Container Service (Amazon ECS) service.

properties.name: ContainerName
properties.description: The name of a container to use with the load balancer.

properties.name: ContainerPort
properties.description: The port number on the container to direct load balancer traffic to. Your container instances must allow ingress traffic on this port.

properties.name: LoadBalancerName
properties.description: The name of the load balancer to associated with the Amazon ECS service.
